column5: Anybody have any experience or info on the area?
Fished there the last five years in May. Interesting place..Definately a rustic outpost. Great fishing. PM me if you have specific questions

We stay at Kettle Falls but end up fishing Stokes Bay every spring (20+ years) so not super familiar with Stokes Bay Resort but agree with Camp Chef that the fishing is awesome in Stokes Bay and that end of the lake.Let me know what info your looking for I'm happy to help, PM if you want.
